meta.title: Mixtape-me
meta.description: Mixtape-me aims to recreate the experience of walking through the doors of a record store looking at CD covers and store walls with colourful albums, memorabilia, and photos, transferring the same experience in a digital form and sharing your mixtape with your friends! Using Spotify's technology, it has never been easier to find out who you listen to the most all year round, last 6 months or even this year. It is a web application built by Felicia Fel.

home.tagline: Throwback to the 90's with Mixtape-me! Share your top 5 songs in a mixtape form ðŸ’¿

mixtapeHeadings.medium: My Mixtape for the last 6 month ðŸ‘¯:

about.title: About
about.content: Mixtape-me is an open source app that sorts your top 5 tracks and make it into a mixtape. All you need to do is login to Spotify and mixtape-me will sort your top tracks according to your listening history on your Spotify account.
about.topTracksTitle: How are the top tracks determined?
about.topTracksContent: Mixtape-me uses your listening history from your Spotify account. All the data is provided by Spotify.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Mixtape-me is an open source app that is developed individualy. By choosing to use this app, you agree to the use of your Spotify account username and data for your top 5 tracks.

No data is used by the app is stored or collected in any way or form. Mixtape-me works by only by simply displaying your top 5 tracks from Spotify.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: Flick me an email at feliu.ren@gmail.com or dm me on Instagram @applescan. I really appreciate any type of feedbacks and suggestions. You can also check out my other projects at
